project_descr: The project seeks to contribute to peace-building and MDG1 achievement by promoting sustainable growth for the economic inclusion of poor, conflict-affected and excluded groups, through innovative productive and financial inclusive solutions

donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea
outputs.output_descr: National, regional and local capacities strengthened to achieve the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) and reduce the levels of poverty and inequality
